{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Udita |image = Portrait Udita convo.png |image2 = PE2 Udita.png |caption = |race = Elf |subrace = Pale |gender = Female |culture = |background = |faction = [Príncipi sen Patrena](/principiSenPatrena/) |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 1 |MIG = 10 |CON = 10 |DEX = 10 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |location = [Dunnage](/dunnage/), [Lifter's Refuge](/liftersRefuge/) |quests = [Bounty - Chornu](/bountyChornu/)
[Bounty - Kuaro](/bountyKuaro/)
[Bounty - Rock-Stomper Rodul](/bountyRockStomperRodul/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Vailian Frock Coat |internalname = npc_dun_principi_bounty_giver |guid = 6e34efc3-7598-496d-859d-019341b133b4 }} '''Udita''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|The pale elf squints at you and puffs on her pipe. Acrid smoke from the bowl wreathes her face.}}A cheerful pale elf in service to the Principi, Udita is a bounty broker, ensuring that people who should wind up at the bottom of the sea end up there. She doesn't ask questions, prefering to live a long life while watching the power plays in the Deadfire unfold. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = * [Bounty - Chornu](/bountyChornu/) * [Bounty - Kuaro](/bountyKuaro/) * [Bounty - Rock-Stomper Rodul](/bountyRockStomperRodul/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * She brokers Principi bounties. [Category:Dunnage characters](/categoryDunnageCharacters/)

She doesn't ask questions, prefering to live a long life while watching the power plays in the Deadfire unfold. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = * [[Bounty - Chornu]] * [[Bounty - Kuaro]] * [[Bounty - Rock-Stomper Rodul]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * She brokers Principi bounties.
